entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 08:28 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
